How It Works

Renting equipment has never been easier. Follow these simple steps to get the tools you need.

01

Browse Equipment

Find the tools you need from our extensive catalog of well-maintained equipment.

02

Reserve Online

Select your rental period and complete the booking with secure online payment.

03

Pick Up

Collect your equipment at our Edina location. We'll have everything ready for you.

04

Return

Bring back the equipment when you're done. Simple, hassle-free returns.
